name: CNO Financial Group, Inc.
description: CNO Financial Group, Inc. is a leading provider of life and health insurance, annuities, and other financial products aimed primarily at the middle-income market. Established in 1979 and headquartered in Carmel, Indiana, CNO operates through various subsidiaries that focus on different segments of the insurance industry. The company primarily serves working-class Americans, providing solutions that include individual life insurance, Medicare supplement insurance, long-term care insurance, and retirement products. CNO is committed to empowering its customers through financial security and has a robust network of agents and brokers that facilitate its distribution strategy. The company emphasizes technology and innovation to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency, leveraging data analytics and digital platforms to better serve its clients. CNO Financial's mission is to support the financial well-being of its policyholders, helping them navigate their insurance needs throughout various life stages.
